data.name: textBox2.Text
data.value: A sanctuary for mind and body, Harmony Haven Retreat is dedicated to holistic well-being. The retreat's architecture seamlessly blends with nature, offering yoga studios with panoramic views of surrounding gardens and meditation spaces surrounded by tranquil ponds. Wellness workshops and classes cater to guests seeking balance and rejuvenation, fostering a sense of harmony and inner peace

data.name: textBox3.Text
data.value: Surrounded by snow-capped peaks, the Alpine Crest Resort is a haven for outdoor enthusiasts. The resort's cozy chalets feature warm fireplaces and breathtaking mountain views, providing the perfect retreat after a day of skiing or hiking. Après-ski activities abound, with a lodge offering hot cocoa by the fire and a spa providing soothing treatments to rejuvenate weary muscles.

data.name: hotelDescription9.Text
data.value: Embraced by verdant valleys, Vista Verde Retreat offers an eco-conscious sanctuary. The retreat's sustainable cabins are nestled amid organic gardens and orchards, providing a peaceful escape. Farm-to-table dining experiences, nature conservation tours, and educational workshops foster a deep connection to the land and promote sustainable living practices.

data.name: hotelDescription8.Text
data.value: Set against a backdrop of crimson-hued cliffs, Crimson Peak Chalet offers a secluded mountain escape. The chalet-style suites feature rustic elegance and expansive windows framing breathtaking canyon views. Hiking trails meander through the rugged landscape, while evenings are spent by the firepit, enjoying the warmth and camaraderie amidst the majestic peaks.

data.name: hotelDescription7.Text
data.value: Enveloped by an ancient forest, Mystic Grove Lodge is a haven for nature lovers. The lodge's log cabins blend seamlessly with the surroundings, offering cozy interiors and verandas that open to lush woodland views. Guided forest walks, wildlife observation points, and storytelling around campfires create an enchanting experience, immersing guests in the mystical beauty of the woods

data.name: hotelDescription6.Text
data.value: Immersed in the heart of untamed wilderness, Wilderness Oasis Lodge provides an authentic escape into nature. Log cabins nestled among towering trees offer a rustic yet comfortable retreat. Guests can embark on guided nature hikes, wildlife spotting excursions, and adventurous activities, providing an intimate connection with the surrounding wilderness, making for an unforgettable outdoor experience.

data.name: hotelDescription5.Text
data.value: Nestled along a peaceful shoreline, the Starlight Shores Lodge offers a serene escape from the hustle and bustle of city life. The lodge's rustic cabins exude cozy charm, each equipped with comfortable furnishings and private balconies overlooking the tranquil waters. At night, guests gather around beachside bonfires, gazing up at the starlit sky while the sound of gentle waves lulls them into a peaceful slumber.

data.name: hotelDescription4.Text
data.value: A hidden oasis, the Enchanted Garden Retreat enchants guests with its sprawling gardens, alive with vibrant flowers and meandering pathways. The retreat features charming cottages and suites tucked away amidst the greenery. Each accommodation is uniquely designed, some with private garden views and whimsical decor, creating an atmosphere that feels straight out of a fairy tale. Tranquility pervades the air, inviting guests to unwind and discover the secret nooks scattered throughout the property.

data.name: hotelDescription10.Text
data.value: Situated in a remote desert region, Luminous Skies Hotel offers an immersive experience under expansive, star-filled skies. The hotel's domed suites feature telescope-equipped terraces for stargazing, complemented by astronomy lectures and celestial-themed dinners. Daytime explorations into nearby canyons and dunes offer a stark contrast to the mesmerizing nighttime skies.

data.name: textBox4.Text
data.value: Located just steps from the sandy shores, the Coastal Breeze Hotel embodies the essence of seaside relaxation. Its airy and light-filled rooms feature breezy decor and balconies overlooking the azure waters. The hotel's laid-back ambiance extends to the beachfront lounge, where guests can unwind with refreshing drinks while soaking up the sun and listening to the gentle sound of waves.
